Package assignment.Action.sec302

Class OccasionalAction

java.lang.Object
assignment.Action.sec302.Action
assignment.Action.sec302.OccasionalAction
public class OccasionalAction extends Action
The class OccasionalAction is a subclass of Action, it will initialize a action which will happen in a specific day of the month.it contains a method occursOn() to determines any tasks to report for the day. Two fields in this class:the field integer 'day' will store the day of the month when the action will happen; the field String 'description' inherited from Action will store the description of the action User use two-arguments constructor to initialize the instance, or use non-argument constructor and use setter to to initialize the two fields later.
Author:
Nian Deng
See Also:
Action

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OccasionalAction()
    Constructs OccasinalAction without argument.day will be set to 0 and description set to null
    OccasionalAction​(int day, String description)
    Constructs OccasinalAction with a description and day user use a string to describe the action and use the day to store which day of the month the activity will occur.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    occursOn​(int year, int month, int day)
    Determines if this action occurs on the specified date.the month and year is not essential here because the occasinalAction only happens on the same day of every month.if the input day matches the method return true, otherwise false.

  • Method Details

    • occursOn

      public boolean occursOn​(int year, int month, int day)
      Determines if this action occurs on the specified date.the month and year is not essential here because the occasinalAction only happens on the same day of every month.if the input day matches the method return true, otherwise false.
      Specified by:
      occursOn in class Action
      Parameters:
      year - the year when the action happens
      month - the month when the action happens
      day - the day when the action happens
      Returns:
      true if the action activity occurs on the same day of every month.
